title: Asking for recommendations from the server

turns.ai_conversation_starter_en: Welcome to our restaurant. Can I start you off with something to drink?
turns.user_response_option_en: Thank you! Can you recommend a refreshing cocktail for tonight?
turns.ai_conversation_starter_ko: 레스토랑에 오신 것을 환영합니다. 마실 것부터 드릴까요?
turns.user_response_option_ko: 감사합니다! 오늘 밤에 마실 상쾌한 칵테일을 추천해 주시겠어요?

turns.ai_conversation_starter_en: Welcome to our restaurant. Can I start you off with something to drink?
turns.user_response_option_en: Sure, can you suggest a wine that pairs well with your seafood dishes?
turns.ai_conversation_starter_ko: 레스토랑에 오신 것을 환영합니다. 마실 것부터 드릴까요?
turns.user_response_option_ko: 해산물 요리와 잘 어울리는 와인을 추천해 주시겠어요?

turns.ai_conversation_starter_en: Welcome to our restaurant. Can I start you off with something to drink?
turns.user_response_option_en: What do you recommend for non-alcoholic drinks? I'm in the mood for something fruity.
turns.ai_conversation_starter_ko: 레스토랑에 오신 것을 환영합니다. 마실 것부터 드릴까요?
turns.user_response_option_ko: 무알코올 음료로 무엇을 추천하시나요? 과일 향이 나는 음료를 마시고 싶어요.

turns.ai_conversation_starter_en: Certainly, we have a delicious signature cocktail called 'Summer Breeze' which is light and refreshing. Would you like me to bring you one to try?
turns.user_response_option_en: That sounds perfect. I'll take one. And for food, do you have any recommendations for spicy dishes?
turns.ai_conversation_starter_ko: 물론 가볍고 상쾌한 '썸머 브리즈'라는 맛있는 시그니처 칵테일도 있습니다. 한 잔 가져다 드릴까요?
turns.user_response_option_ko: 완벽하네요. 한 잔 주세요. 음식으로는 매운 요리를 추천해 주시겠어요?

turns.ai_conversation_starter_en: Certainly, we have a delicious signature cocktail called 'Summer Breeze' which is light and refreshing. Would you like me to bring you one to try?
turns.user_response_option_en: Hmm, I'm not sure. Can you tell me more about the Summer Breeze? And what do you suggest as a pairing for it?
turns.ai_conversation_starter_ko: 물론 가볍고 상쾌한 '썸머 브리즈'라는 맛있는 시그니처 칵테일도 있습니다. 한 잔 가져다 드릴까요?
turns.user_response_option_ko: 흠, 잘 모르겠네요. 서머 브리즈에 대해 자세히 설명해 주시겠어요? 그리고 어떤 페어링을 추천하시나요?

turns.ai_conversation_starter_en: Certainly, we have a delicious signature cocktail called 'Summer Breeze' which is light and refreshing. Would you like me to bring you one to try?
turns.user_response_option_en: Thank you, I'll give the Summer Breeze a try. Do you have any vegetarian options on the menu that would complement the flavors of the drink?

turns.user_response_option_ko: 감사합니다, 서머 브리즈를 마셔볼게요. 메뉴에 음료의 맛을 보완할 수 있는 채식주의자 옵션이 있나요?

turns.ai_conversation_starter_en: Certainly, our Chardonnay pairs well with most of our seafood dishes. Would you like me to bring you a glass to taste?
turns.user_response_option_en: Yes, that sounds great. Can you also suggest a few seafood dishes that would pair well with it?
turns.ai_conversation_starter_ko: 물론 샤르도네는 대부분의 해산물 요리와 잘 어울립니다. 시음할 수 있도록 한 잔 가져다 드릴까요?
turns.user_response_option_ko: 네, 그거 좋겠네요. 이와 잘 어울리는 해산물 요리도 몇 가지 추천해 주시겠어요?

turns.ai_conversation_starter_en: Certainly, our Chardonnay pairs well with most of our seafood dishes. Would you like me to bring you a glass to taste?
turns.user_response_option_en: Actually, do you have any other white wines that you would recommend for seafood?
turns.ai_conversation_starter_ko: 물론 샤르도네는 대부분의 해산물 요리와 잘 어울립니다. 시음할 수 있도록 한 잔 가져다 드릴까요?
turns.user_response_option_ko: 해산물과 어울리는 다른 화이트 와인이 있나요?

turns.ai_conversation_starter_en: Certainly, our Chardonnay pairs well with most of our seafood dishes. Would you like me to bring you a glass to taste?
turns.user_response_option_en: Thanks for the suggestion. I'll try the Chardonnay and can you also recommend a non-alcoholic option for my friend who's not drinking tonight?
turns.ai_conversation_starter_ko: 물론 샤르도네는 대부분의 해산물 요리와 잘 어울립니다. 시음할 수 있도록 한 잔 가져다 드릴까요?
turns.user_response_option_ko: 제안해 주셔서 감사합니다. 샤르도네를 마셔볼게요, 오늘 술을 마시지 않는 친구를 위해 무알코올 옵션도 추천해 주시겠어요?

turns.ai_conversation_starter_en: One of our most popular non-alcoholic drinks is our fresh-squeezed lemonade with raspberry syrup. Would you like to try that?

turns.user_response_option_ko: 정말 맛있겠네요! 저도 저거 하나 주세요.

turns.ai_conversation_starter_en: One of our most popular non-alcoholic drinks is our fresh-squeezed lemonade with raspberry syrup. Would you like to try that?
